t: Kino Lorber Launches Kino Film Collection Streaming Service
s: November 2, 2023 - Richard Lorber, President and CEO of Kino Lorber, said, “I’m excited about Kino Film Collection as a destination for our newest films fresh from festivals and theaters, as well as newly launched restorations of classics and curated selections from our vast library, many streaming for the first time.
